players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.

Diana: "

"

Bob: "

"
You: "Bob is acting suspiciously and hasn't said anything yet, I'm keeping an eye on him."
Diana: "Bob, can you tell us what happened last night?"
You: "Bob is acting suspiciously and hasn't said anything yet, I'm keeping an eye on him."
Bob: "I didn't do anything, I was asleep the whole time."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Diana voted for Alice (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
Bob was arrested
